Career Opportunities

Hi-Res Media Group is a cooperative unit of digital marketing professionals. We are always eager to find creative freelancers to partner with, including graphic designers, software developers, photographers, videographers, copywriters and more. If you'd like to collaborate with us or work with us on a project, contact us! We'd love to hear from you.
